name: SAMUHIK UTTHAN SEWA SAMITI
briefDescription: Samuhik Utthan Sewa Samiti is a Non  Profit Organization . It is registered under  Society Registration Act 1860. We are specially working in Women  Empowerment , Rural Development , Spreading awareness, Healthcare, providing Self Employment , De addiction, Value Based Education, Against Child Labour,introduce  new technologies to society .our organization is committed to uplift the weaker part of the society .
